org.dexpi.pid.symbols

Class XmlAndPngBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dexpi.pid.symbols.XmlAndPngBuilder

  • public class XmlAndPngBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    phbe01 Reads in the xml code of a symbol and creates a temporary plantModel file to draw the image. The image is trimmed to remove unnecessary white space.

    • Field Summary

      Draws the created temporary xml file via the GraphicBuilder.
      void createXMLFile(java.lang.String INPUT_XML_SYMBOL)
      Creates the temporary plantModel xml file by joining header, footer and symbol.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage trim(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
      trims the image to remove white space around symbols (leaves 5px at each side)

    • Method Detail

      • createXMLFile

        public void createXMLFile(java.lang.String INPUT_XML_SYMBOL)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the temporary plantModel xml file by joining header, footer and symbol. The symbol is written to the shapeCatalogue and referenced by its componentName in the footer.
        Parameters:
        INPUT_XML_SYMBOL - the symbol to be drawn
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception thrown

      • buildImage

        public void buildImage(java.lang.String INPUT_XML_SYMBOL)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                       javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Draws the created temporary xml file via the GraphicBuilder.
        Parameters:
        INPUT_XML_SYMBOL - the symbol to be drawn, only used for naming the image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception thrown
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - exception thrown
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - exception thrown

      • trim

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage trim(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
        trims the image to remove white space around symbols (leaves 5px at each side)
        Parameters:
        img - the image to be trimmed
        Returns:
        the trimmed image
